about_the_game:
It's been three years since the asteroid hit the planet.
Three years since the mass "vanishing" of dinosaurs everywhere.

You and your friends were supposed to further your academy studies in college, but then Elsinore became the only refuge from an ongoing, incredibly deadly winter. Some say it is a delayed reaction to the asteroid, some say it is a religious cleansing. Whatever the case, it has left the world in ruins. Bandits run rampant, disease spreads, and new and unique species have risen. Starting from where the end of the game left off (and yes, it does take into consideration how you ended the base game), you and your fellow saurians have been tasked with putting on a play that will raise the spirits of the freezing denizens of what used to the world's prized academy for learning.

FEATURES

  • New Skills!: The base game now has a section for training skills that will be used in the DLC-sequel!
  • Rebuild Elsinore & Fight Bandits!: You are in charge of a world-renowned fighting unit, charged with protecting Elsinore at all costs!

HOW TO START THE DLC

Play to the end of the game, and it will ask if you'd like to continue. Say yes, and you will start the sequel. Will require a fresh game.
